title: AI‑native data core seen sparking multi‑trillion dollar healthcare structural shift
summary: A commentary issued on behalf of VentriPoint Diagnostics Ltd. describes a significant structural shift in healthcare driven by AI‑native data cores, with artificial intelligence reshaping diagnostics, workflows and drug discovery markets, according to the press release summary. The global AI medical imaging market is projected at about $2.57 trillion in 2026 as healthcare systems move away […] The post AI‑native data core seen sparking multi‑trillion dollar healthcare structural shift appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
